alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 3:28AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL ST. CHARLES AND NORTH CENTRAL LAFOURCHE PARISHES THROUGH 400 AM CST... At 327 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of South Vacherie to near Bayou Cane. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hahnville, Lockport, Mathews, Paradis, Des Allemands, Raceland, Ama, Bayou Gauche, Luling, Boutte, St. Rose, and Destrehan. This includes Interstate 310 between mile markers 8 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for southeastern Louisiana.
